title: Can a woman in menses pray the Eid Prayer
transcript: says that a woman in her mensis does she pray definitely not prayer is not permissible for a woman in her mensis but the Hadith tells us that the women in the Menses used to be instructed to go and attend the congregation of Eid and avoid prayer so they would be there with the congregation and they would witness the supplication and invocation of Allah Asel to goodness and they would get their part of that so this is the Sunnah ABD she's saying
